title: Ticket #4132: NO_DNS may still require and use DNS
description:
This needs to be investigated; the exact cause is not clear.

My desktop, puffin, has DNS. If I set NO_DNS=TRUE and set up a personal HTCondor, everything works as expected.

tlmiller's virtual machines have no DNS. If I set NO_DNS=TRUE, the condor_master is unable to recognize that it's own IP address is present in COLLECTOR_HOST, and from that determine the correct port. As a result, it uses 9618 in all cases.

This needs investigation. My intial guess is that HTCondor is using DNS anyway to try and find localhost's IP address.
